question: Ronald and Elan are working on an assignment. Ronald takes 6 hours to type 32 pages on a computer, while Elan takes 5 hours to type 40 pages. How much time will they take working together on two different computers to type an assignment of 110 pages ?
explanation:
Ronald\'s 1 hour\'s work $latex = \\frac{32}{6}=\\frac{16}{3}\\ pages&s=1$
Pages typed in 6 hrs. = 32, Pages typed in 1 hr $latex = \\frac{32}{6}&s=1$
Elan\'s 1 hour\'s work = 8 pages
1 hour\'s work of the both $latex = \\frac{16}{3}+8 = \\frac{40}{3}\\ pages&s=1$
âˆ´ Required Time $latex = \\frac{110\\times 3}{40} = \\frac{33}{4}\\ hours = 8\\ hours\\ 15\\ minutes&s=1$
Hence option [C] is correct answer
